text: @MSNBC After the first confirmed case of Coronavirus from a polling site, @TomPerez should be charged with reckless endangerment. The first death should be MURDER IN THE FIRST DEGREE. This is premeditated. This is simple, the cdc says no more than 50, trump said 10 today. Unconscionable
